issues.description: The getStockIngredients method in the Stock class has a return type mismatch between the template repository and the solution repository. The template returns a List<StockIngredient>, while the solution returns a StockIngredient[]. This inconsistency could confuse students who start with the template code and try to match it against the expected solution, potentially leading to errors in how they handle the returned data structure.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the template repository's Stock class to return StockIngredient[] instead of List<StockIngredient> to align with the solution repository, ensuring students work with arrays as implied by the overall exercise structure.
